content:
We're well aware that many of you aren't in London, and that those of you that are, are used to interacting with EG through your computers while probably wearing pajamas or avoiding work--that's fine, because that's how we're used to interacting with you, too. But this weekend, we've got an opportunity to get both of us out of the house for a bit, and learn quite a bit about sustainable development--we hope you'll join us at London Aware 08.
We'll be at the Barbican Centre in London; a venue chosen for the affair because of their wonderful policies on sustainability and recycling. To say that this is going to be a good conference (we know - contradiction in terms) is an understatement: there will be 75 industry-leading exhibitors, world class speakers on "greening" every aspect of your life as well as climate change, guest author appearances, and a special award presented to a student for eco-innovation. After all students are the ones that have to deal with the mess we're leaving them.
In the words of conference orgainser Danny /Chris' 
 
 drinking buddy/, "come along, it's fucking great!"
[
]
title: Join Environmental Graffiti At London Aware 08
author: whatsrequired
